use.flag: Install dependencies needed to run in web server mode
Install app-admin/hddtemp to enable hard drive temp monitoring
Install dev-python/docker to enable docker container monitoring
Install dev-python/zeroconf to enable autodiscover features
Install dev-python/requests to enable cloud support
Install dev-python/pygal to enable SVG graph support
Install dev-python/netifaces to enable IP info
Install dev-python/pymdstat to enable RAID support and monitoring
Install dev-python/pysnmp to enable SNMP support
